name: A Trip To The Clinic
description:
A Trip to the Clinic is an old Twine game about trans healthcare I made for a game jam back in 2013 (oof) inspired by the #transdocfail discussion on Twitter at the time. It was based on my own experiences with the NHS gender clinic system in the UK, which were very fresh at the timing of writing. Upon finding out the game was no longer hosted at its original location, I've decided to upload a copy here without revision for, like, posterity I guess?

I do hope the game has become somewhat dated in the last eight years, with gatekeeping practices becoming less common or severe.

Thanks to Lizard for letting me know the game was no longer online, to the Wayback Machine, because I apparently never locally backed up a copy, and also to Ruth Pearce for her flattering discussion of the game in her book Understanding Trans Health.
